thread.title: Ladies NSFW: This Fawad Khan and Ranbir Kapoor selfie is too hot to handle!
thread.title_full: Ladies NSFW: This Fawad Khan and Ranbir Kapoor selfie is too hot to handle! | Latest News & Updates at Daily News & Analysis

author: dna webdesk
title: Ladies NSFW: This Fawad Khan and Ranbir Kapoor selfie is too hot to handle!
text:
How much hotness can there be in one picture? Recently, director Karan Johar posted a picture which showed Bollywood’s most eligible bachelor Ranbir Kapoor with Pakistani actor Fawad Khan.
The selfie is from the sets of Ae Dil Hai Mushkil which stars Aiswarya Rai Bachan as Ranbir Kapoor’s love interest and also has Anushka Sharma. The movie also has cameos by Pakistani actors Fawad Khan and Imran Abbas. Imran Abbas has already shot his portions in London and now it’s Fawad’s turn to shoot in London. Hopefully, the Shiv Sena will not feel the need to throw ink on Karan Johar’s face. One can’t see the ladies take that lying down.
(Read: Fawad Khan opens up about intimate scene with Alia Bhatt )
